title: Client Issues
body: Constantly getting forced to repair the client, and every time I try to watch a replay when it is working I get a bugsplat.

replies.body: Damn, it seems that either the repair isn't fixing bad assets properly.  Getting a bugsplat as well can indicate outdated drivers or hardware, but let's focus on the game files for now.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for this specific issue, and see if a force repatch will help.  Just be sure to test it in a custom so you don't get any penalties.
